I'm not sure about optimized or not, but I have played up to 2560x1440 with good results.  It will always depend on your machine.  There is a UI scale option in the settings in case you want make the interface buttons and windows bigger or smaller.  When I was running at 2560x1440 a couple mods (KER in particular) had very tiny text and I couldn't find a way to scale that up so I just moved back down to 1920x1080 and altered the UI scale accordingly.

I'm playing on 1920x1080 and everything just works fine.
